title: Miele : global revenue 2006/07 to 2017/18
summary: Overall Revenue in billion euros has increased over the Year.
Revenue in billion euros is roughly constant from 2006/07 to 2008/09, and lastly slightly increasing from 2008/09 to 2014/15.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013/14 and 2014/15.
Maximum Revenue in billion euros, about 3.49 was reported at Year 2014/15
The lowest Revenue in billion euros, of value 2.74 was reported at Year 2006/07
min_summary: In general Revenue in billion euros has rose over the Year.
